verses.text: And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* had \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, unto the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, to the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, and to them that brought \w up|strong="H0539"\w* \w Ahab’s|strong="H0256"\w* \add children\add*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 10.1 \ft them…: Heb. nourishers\f*

Now as soon as this \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to you, seeing your \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add are\add* with you, and \add there are\add* with you \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, a \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* also, and \w armour|strong="H5402"\w*;

Look even \w out|strong="H7200"\w* the \w best|strong="H2896"\w* and \w meetest|strong="H3477"\w* of your \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add him\add* on his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* for your \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

But they were \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* not \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: how then shall we \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*?

And he that \add was\add* over the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and he that \add was\add* over the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* also, and the bringers \w up|strong="H0539"\w* \add of the children\add*, \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We \add are\add* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all that thou shalt \w bid|strong="H0559"\w* us; we will not make \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*: \w do|strong="H6213"\w* thou \add that which is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

Then he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* a \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w* to them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If ye \add be\add* mine, and \add if\add* ye will \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* ye the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* your \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to me to \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* by to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* this \w time|strong="H6256"\w*. Now the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \add being\add* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w*, \add were\add* with the great \w men|strong="H1419"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, which brought them \w up|strong="H1431"\w*.\f + \fr 10.6 \ft mine: Heb. for me\f*

And it came to pass, when the \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to them, that they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* in \w baskets|strong="H1731"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him \add them\add* to \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

¶ And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, They have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Lay|strong="H7760"\w* ye them in \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w heaps|strong="H6652"\w* at the entering \w in|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

And it came to pass in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, that he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Ye \add be\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: behold, I \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against my \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* him: but who \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* all these?

\w Know|strong="H3045"\w* \w now|strong="H0645"\w* that there shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* unto the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* nothing of the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* concerning the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add that\add* which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*.  +  r 10.10  t by: Heb. by the hand of *

So \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* all that \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, and all his great \w men|strong="H1419"\w*, and his \w kinsfolks|strong="H3045"\w*, and his \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, until he \w left|strong="H7604"\w* him none \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w*.\f + \fr 10.11 \ft kinsfolks: or, acquaintance\f*

¶ And he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w departed|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w came|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. \add And\add* as he \add was\add* at the \w shearing|strong="H7462"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*,\f + \fr 10.12 \ft shearing…: Heb. house of shepherds binding sheep\f*

\w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w met|strong="H4672"\w* with the \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add are\add* ye? And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, We \add are\add* the \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*; and we go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w salute|strong="H7965"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w queen|strong="H1377"\w*.\f + \fr 10.13 \ft met with: Heb. found\f*\f + \fr 10.13 \ft to salute…: Heb. to the peace of, etc\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H8610"\w* them \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*. And they \w took|strong="H8610"\w* them \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* them at the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w* of the shearing \w house|strong="H1044"\w*, \add even\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*; neither \w left|strong="H7604"\w* he \w any|strong="H0376"\w* of them.

¶ And when he was \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* thence, he \w lighted|strong="H4672"\w* on \w Jehonadab|strong="H3082"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w* \add coming\add* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him: and he \w saluted|strong="H1288"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him, \w Is|strong="H3426"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*, as my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \add is\add* with thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*? And \w Jehonadab|strong="H3082"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, It \w is|strong="H3426"\w*. If it be, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add me\add* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. And he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add him\add* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and he took him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to him into the \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w*.\f + \fr 10.15 \ft lighted on: Heb. found\f*\f + \fr 10.15 \ft saluted: Heb. blessed\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* with me, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. So they made him \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* in his \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*.

And when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, he \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* all that \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* unto \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, till he had \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* him, according to the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*.

¶ And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* a \w little|strong="H4592"\w*; \add but\add* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him \w much|strong="H7235"\w*.

Now therefore \w call|strong="H7121"\w* unto me all the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, all his \w servants|strong="H5647"\w*, and all his \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*; let \w none|strong="H0376"\w* be \w wanting|strong="H6485"\w*: for I have a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \add to do\add* to \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*; whosoever shall be \w wanting|strong="H6485"\w*, he shall not \w live|strong="H2421"\w*. But \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* in \w subtilty|strong="H6122"\w*, to the intent that he might \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* the \w worshippers|strong="H5647"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.

And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Proclaim|strong="H6942"\w* a solemn \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w* for \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*. And they \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 10.20 \ft Proclaim: Heb. Sanctify\f*

And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* through all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and all the \w worshippers|strong="H5647"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, so that there was not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* not. And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*; and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* was \w full|strong="H4390"\w* from one \w end|strong="H6310"\w* to \w another|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 10.21 \ft full…: or, so full that they stood mouth to mouth\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him that \add was\add* over the \w vestry|strong="H4458"\w*, Bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w vestments|strong="H3830"\w* for all the \w worshippers|strong="H5647"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*. And he brought them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w vestments|strong="H4403"\w*.

And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w Jehonadab|strong="H3082"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w*, into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w worshippers|strong="H5647"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w Search|strong="H2664"\w*, and \w look|strong="H7200"\w* that there \w be|strong="H3426"\w* here with you none of the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, but the \w worshippers|strong="H5647"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* only.

And when they went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* and burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add If\add* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* whom I have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*, \add he that letteth him go\add*, his \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \add shall be\add* for the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of him.

And it came to pass, as soon as he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w offering|strong="H6213"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, that \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* and to the \w captains|strong="H7991"\w*, Go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \add and\add* \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* them; let \w none|strong="H0376"\w* come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*. And they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* and the \w captains|strong="H7991"\w* cast \add them\add* \w out|strong="H7993"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.\f + \fr 10.25 \ft the edge: Heb. the mouth\f*

And they brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w images|strong="H4676"\w* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* them.\f + \fr 10.26 \ft images: Heb. statues\f*

And they brake \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w image|strong="H4676"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and brake \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w made|strong="H7760"\w* it a draught \w house|strong="H4163"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
Thus \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* out of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ Howbeit \add from\add* the \w sins|strong="H2399"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, \add to wit\add*, the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and that \add were\add* in \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, Because thou hast done \w well|strong="H2895"\w* in \w executing|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \add and\add* hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* according to all that \add was\add* in mine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add generation\add* shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

But \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* took no \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with all his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: for he \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, which made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.\f + \fr 10.31 \ft took…: Heb. observed not\f*

¶ In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w cut|strong="H7096"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w short|strong="H7096"\w*: and \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them in all the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;\f + \fr 10.32 \ft to cut: Heb. to cut off the ends\f*

From \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*, all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, and the \w Manassites|strong="H4520"\w*, from \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, even \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* and \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.\f + \fr 10.33 \ft eastward: Heb. toward the rising of the sun\f*\f + \fr 10.33 \ft even…: or, even to Gilead and Bashan\f*

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and all his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: and they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. And \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* that \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.\f + \fr 10.36 \ft the time: Heb. the days were\f*
